attributes.action: Insist Paul Arnison gets a picture ontop of the CUFC online messageboard.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What more is there to say? Its a festering wound in the fabric of English society that needs the immediate attention of Tony Blair.
He could even force those two doing impressions of Labour M.P's Jamie Reed and Eric Martlew to get on side.
Thanks alot like eh.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
